review: It works exceedingly well with Netflix and YouTube videos - in fact I get better quality through the Chromecast dongle than I do through the dedicated apps on my second generation AppleTV. It also allows me to push videos up on the screen through the Chrome browser which is quite nice. I often watch UK television via my browser and can now watch it on my HDTV thanks to Chromecast. For $35 it's probably the cheapest and easiest option for a lot of viewers.
